mapper.select: SELECT userno, name, id, password, phone, address FROM user

SELECT userno, name, id, password, phone, address FROM user WHERE CAST(userno AS CHAR) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR address LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
